argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvgcl.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvgcl.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_nvgrp | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_bafval | |- X = ran G |
| 5 | 4 | #P_grporcan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G C ) = ( B G C ) <-> A = B ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G C ) = ( B G C ) <-> A = B ) ) |
